title: Market Momentum Analysis
content: Nifty 50 at 24,860: Banking sector leading gains with HDFC Bank +2.1%, ICICI +1.8%. IT sector showing recovery signs. Key resistance at 25,000.

title: Options Trading Strategy
content: Weekly Options Strategy: Nifty trading near 24,860. Consider 24,800 PE and 25,000 CE for range-bound market. Max profit zone: 24,800-25,000.

title: Q4 2025 Investment Outlook
content: Focus on quality mid-caps as Q3 earnings approach. IT sector revival, pharma for defense, infrastructure for growth. Maintain 60:30:10 equity-debt-gold allocation.

title: Breakout Alert - Reliance
content: Reliance Industries breaking out from consolidation. CMP: ₹2,450, Target: ₹2,520, SL: ₹2,420. Volume surge confirms bullish momentum.

title: FII/DII Activity Update
content: FIIs net buyers at ₹1,200 crores today. DIIs supporting at ₹800 crores. Positive institutional sentiment driving market higher.
